title: Virgin and the Gypsy
brief_description: D.H. Lawrence’s famous classic of two debutantes, fresh out of finishing school, one ready to rebel against her father who is the local vicar, the other girl not yet ready to face the world. They meet a gypsy girl who changes their Victorian lives forever.
